mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_power(power_name, power_company, power_capacity, power_regdate, power_price, power_image) VALUES(#{power_name},#{power_company},#{power_capacity},now(),#{power_price},#{power_image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM p_power WHERE power_status=0) p_power WHERE power_capacity >= #{power_capacity} ORDER BY power_capacity,power_price
